metadata.title: CVE-2024-57908 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: imu: kmx61: fix information leak in triggered bufferThe 'buffer' local array is used to push data to user space from atriggered buffer, but it does not set values for inactive channels, asit only uses iio_for_each_active_channel() to assign new values.Initialize the array to zero before using it to avoid pushinguninitialized information to userspace.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-20.20').
